item.title: 'Catastrophe': At least 60 killed, thousands injured as massive blast flattens Beirut
item.description:
A massive explosion rocked Beirut on Tuesday, flattening much of the port, damaging buildings across the capital and sending a giant mushroom cloud into the sky.
More than 60 people were killed and more ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

item.title: 'I left as a broken girl': Young gymnast's battle with bulimia after coach's 'abuse'
item.description:
